law.catch_line: Nothing in this subtitle creates any liability on the State for the payment of any funds to any part...
law.text:
Nothing in this subtitle creates any liability on the State for the payment of any funds to any participating credit union or other person by reason of:
An act or omission of a credit union share guaranty corporation; or
A deficiency of a participating credit union in the event a credit union share guaranty corporation is unable to pay the deficiency.
